Election Information
Election Information

**Elections:**  
The Board of Commissioners are elected for two year terms. All positions are At-Large, meaning they are elected on a city wide basis.  City elections take place on the first Saturday of May each year, with Commissioners for Places 1-3 elected on Odd years, while commissioners for Places 4-5 on even years.   There are no term limits for City Commissioners.

**Deadline for Filing for Election:**  
Deadline for filing an application Contact the City Secretary at 254-629-8321 or citysec@eastlandtexas.gov.

**Next General Election for Commissioner Places 4-5 is May 2, 2026.**

**What is a Passkey?**  
Imagine signing into your account as easily as unlocking your phone—no more worrying about remembering or typing a password. A passkey is a secure digital key that uses the safety features in your device to keep your account protected. It’s designed to be both simple to use and highly secure.  
Ready to experience a simpler, safer sign-in? Click the button above to create your passkey now.
